body:
On 11 Jan 2008, at 15:38, wjr wrote:
I'm sure you should find quite a few rendering packages in the open
source
corner that would even work on Solaris. They might not be all that
easy to
use, though. But then neither is Radiance.
First thing: You need to have development tools installed (c-
compiler, etc).

Second: It should be "makeall install" (but I think that's what you
wanted to say).

Third: It certainly did not do "nothing". The command line "makeall
install" will have
some sort of result. Even a "command not found" would tell us more
about your problems.

Forget about the mouse. Radiance will be a whole new (command line)
experience.
More details about your system (development tools) and the reaction
of the shell
when you try to run "makeall install"
Please send details ;)

Regards,
Thomas
subject: [Radiance-general] New installation
